body.name: Microfiber Spray Mop for Floor Cleaning - Reusable Floor Mop with 3 Washable Pads, Refillable Bottle Flat Mop with Sprayer for Hardwood Laminate Wood Floor Cleaning
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Household Floor Cleaning helper】SOBONNE floor mop with sprayer is wireless and no batteries spray mop. Attached extra-large mop head cleans 40% faster than the other mops. And Flexible mop head design, Which allows to reach any crevices and deep corner with ease such as under the sofa, bed ect. Make your cleaning more convenient and easier .

【Refillable Bottle】Just pour 2 small teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution into your spray mop bottle and fill the rest with water . Gently pull the trigger of reusable mop to spray and start your cleaning. No more buying expensive chemical solution refills. Say goodbye to bulky buckets or cumbersome mops.

【Anti-leakage and Mist Spray】Our spray mop with washable pads adopts new-upgrade craftsmanship for anti-leakage, Improved the problem of leakage of other mop with sprayer after use . And ours wet mop is a fine mist spray compared to others , Which allow for a perfect clean without oversaturating your floors which can cause damage.

【Reusable Microfiber Mop Pads】Microfiber spray mop pads have millions of microscopic fibers , Which can quickly absorb the water stains on the floor surface and take away the dirt, pet hair on the floor. Spray mop come with 3 pcs washable mop replacement pads. Save your money and Environmentally friendly.

【Zero Risk Purchase】Our refillable mops are lightweight, convenient and easy to use. If you have any questions about our spray mops for floor cleaning, please contact us, Our customer service is online 24/7, We provide a 180-day worry-free warranty .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOBONNE's new generation of upgraded spray mops for floor cleaning is wireless and no batteries, Let you get an easier and more convenient cleaning way . Say goodbye to bulky buckets or cumbersome mops . Bring you a new cleaning experience !

Dry and Wet Use Floor mop comes with 3 microfiber pads, featuring excellent water absorption and premium dust and hair collection. So whether you're using it as a dry mop or a wet mop, it's great. 360° Rotation Mops Head Flexible floor mop head allows to reach any crevices and deep corner with ease such as under the sofa, bed ect. Make your cleaning easier. Large Mop Head Our spray mop is attached 16.5 inch extra-large mop head cleans 40% faster than the other mops.

Refillable Bottle Just pour 2 small teaspoons of cleaning solution to water in the mop bottle and you are ready to shine your floors.Get rid of the bulky bucket. and more convenient . Reusable Washable Mop Pads Our microfiber mop pads are easily machine-washed and reusable . Repeated washing will not weaken cleaning ability or water absorption capacity.Microfiber pad is equivalent to more than 200 disposable mop pads. Save your money. Cleaning Scraper A cleaning helper, You can use it to clean the hair on the mop pads, remove excess water, and clean up stubborn stains on the ground. wall mop velcro design Multifunctional Scraper with Comb Easy to Store The top of wet jet mop handle has a metal ring, so you could hang the mop on the wall when you not using it. You do not need to worry about where should you put it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and store
reviews.reviewText: You can load it with your own cleaning solution and it does a great job! It definitely makes cleaning easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have never felt true love for an inanimate object before this mop. It's so light, easy to use, so many pads!! It's the mop the janky swiffer wishes it was. I have 2 just in case but my first one is on year 2 and still going strong. I have gifted this in purple to all the women in my family and they all love this mop. No bucket, no wringing, no backache!! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value, but it's no Reveal Mop
reviews.reviewText: The mop is a solid value, but the detergent bottle is a little small and the components are not of the highest quality. But it's lightweight, the sprayer works reliably, and the pads are sufficiently thick and clean well. (The purple pads bleed so wash at least once before using.) Overall it does what it's supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little mop
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace my old mop that was similar to this but that I had clogged when doing a cinnamon cleansing (don't ask). Anyway, this is a great simple little mop and I like that the pads are washable. However, I will not be putting cinnamon in the cleanser container this time. I'll just keep it in a separate spray bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got the Grey one ❤ it!!!
reviews.reviewText: Much nicer than swiffer. Solution sprays out in a triangular fashion. This mop is wide so it cleans a wider surface floor area. Sprayer works great on the handle and I don't have to worry about accidentally squeezing it while mopping. Mop glides smoothly on wet floors without the washable microfiber pad feeling like it's gonna come off while using. Assembly only took 5min to put together. I used it as soon as it arrived and my kitchen floor looks clean using my own personal cleaning solution. Im gonna save a ton by not having to buy disposable pads and pre-made solution. No batteries required.1. Would I recommend to a friend? For now I would say yes, but that can change after a 3-6 month **Update** coming soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at what a great mop this is. The price was low so didn't expect a lot. It's perfect. It cleans the floors beautifully. I love the mop heads. It's compact, lightweight and easy to put together. I love the sprayer. It comes with 3 reusable mop heads. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars built in pump will not spray or work!!
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! construction is okay, but the spray mechanism will NOT work. verydisappointed, waited to long to try it and now its too late to return it. Piece of junk!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the design and it absolutely works amazing. Easy to assemble. Amazing price and i just loved it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy práctico y fácil de usar
reviews.reviewText: Limpia fácil y rápido, sin necesidad de utilizar cubeta de agua
